verbose_text: Melatonin treatment has been reported to promote osteogenic differentiation, vitality, and mobility of MSCs, resulting in improved MSCs therapy of skeletal defect XREF_BIBR, sepsis induced kidney injury XREF_BIBR, acute lung ischemia-reperfusion injury XREF_BIBR and skin wound healing XREF_BIBR.
evidence: Melatonin treatment has been reported to promote osteogenic differentiation
